name: Smartline Coach
tag_list: airport-transfers, airport-shuttle-uk, mini-bus-hire, 8-seater-minibus-hire, 16-seater-minibus-hire, private-hire-minibus, day-trips, special-occasions-transportation, mini-bus-rentals
overview:
Smartline Coach offers competitively priced minibus hire in and around London and Nation wide choices for all types of events and occasions.

We operate a quality Minibus service with qualified drivers. We will travel to any destination in the UK. Whether you are planning a corporate function for a business, Airport Transfer, Tours, Day Trips, Excursions, Events, Fun night out, Road shows, Wedding Services, Funerals and Cultural Events. We can provide you with transport, personalized to suit your needs from 1 to 16 passengers.

All vehicles are cleaned to the highest standards to ensure your journey is as comfortable as possible. CRB Documents and Risk Assessments can be supplied on request from the Health & Safety Manager.

We cover all UK airports including: Gatwick, Heathrow, Luton, Stansted and City Airports in London as well as Manchester, Leeds, Glasgow, Edinburgh, Bristol, East Midlands as well as major Ports including Dover, Southampton and Folkestone.
